event_type.description: Name of speed range set, use main for default one.

force_strength_threshold.description: The amount tof force strength required to trigger this event type

stagger_cooldown.description: Indicates the time required to re-trigger the stagger.

stagger_duration.description: Indicates the duration of the stagger applied.

normalize_2d.description: [bool]do we normalize the stagger direction to 2d space by removing the up vector component.
